projects.title: COUNSELING PSYCHOLOGIST
projects.description: Bhumika has a master's degree in psychology. She has over four years of experience working in a range of settings including private practice, schools, and community settings. Bhumika's approach is trauma-informed, queer-affirmative and culturally-sensitive, focusing on individualized support.

projects.title: THERAPY APPROACHES
projects.description: We utilize evidence-based approaches including cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT), TEAM CBT, mindfulness-based practices, trauma-informed approaches, and solution-focused therapy.

image.alt: SERVICES OFFERED IN FOLLOWING THERAPY APPROACHES
